title: Thuderbird no longer opens
content: Suddenly Thunderbird has stopped opening. I have tried Uninstalling and reinstalling.
creator: keith.elmer

title: Reenvío con mucha información
content: Hola! Tengo un problema al reenviar mensajes. He visto algún mensaje en el foro con este error pero no se llega a dar solución. La cuestión es que al reenviar un mensaje antes del texto reenviado sale una tabla con mucha información, con comandos, emails, etc... Es muy larga y si la borro entera se pierde el email desde el que se recibió el mensaje original. Como puedo hacer para que no salga toda esta información en forma de tabla?
creator: laura.andres.salvat

title: Hilo conversaciones
content: Hola!! Cuando me contestan a un mensaje se queda debajo en el hilo de la conversación y thunderbird me marca en la bandeja de entrada que tengo un mensaje nuevo pero no se marca la conversación en negro para que vea donde está el mensaje. Solo si expando el hilo veo donde está el mensaje. Se puede configurar para que se marque el original como nuevo? O se podría ordenar para que salga el primero? Porque si es un mensaje de hace un mes y recibo 50 mails al día me es muy difícil localizarlo... Otra cosa sería que no salga como hilo sino como un mensaje nuevo el primero. Se puede configurar así? Necesito una forma de localizarlos rápidamente.
creator: laura.andres.salvat

title: emails suddenly stopped downloading into Thunderbird
content: A few days ago for some unknown reason in the middle of the afternoon Thunderbird stopped downloading emails. Though I can still send. I can still access them in my BT account online but can't process them into folders etc. I tried looking in the online forum, looking at advice given to past users with a similar problem, but none of the advice seemed to help with mine. I have checked the account settings and nothing has changed. The server is pop.wanadoo.co.uk I also noticed that the interface for the address book contacts has changed dramatically, presumably due to an update? Could that have anything to do with the problem? I have of course tried restarting the computer in hope but that didn't work! Do you have any advice please?
creator: Carolofdawes

title: Profile file Problems
content: On replacing a profile from a backup due to problems all sqlite, json and msf type files appeared in the folders list insted of the folders and there is no address books. Have made a clean install of Thunderbird and tried again to use various profile backups but get the same problem.

title: Email address transfer from Thunderbird to Outlook
content: How do I move a group of people and their email address from Thunderbird to Outlook, without losing the email addresses?

title: Don't have 0auth2 in TB 107.2. Can't send emails
content:
Installed 107.2. Can receive emails but can't send them. I have a gmail domains for forwarding mail.

Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smpt.gmail.com failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again.

Server Name: smpt.gmail.com Port: 465 User Name: *******@gmail.com Authentication method: Using normal password because no 0auth2 is available Connection Security: SSL/TLS

I've entered a new smpt and deleted the one I set TB up with. I've tried every configuration. This seems to be a very big problem for a lot of people, with no solution coming from TB support.

Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

Linda
creator: cadred

title: ImportExport Tool Ng Backup help
content: I am using Ng to backup my emails and have it set to save all files. Now I am running out of disk space because it is using so much space. If I delete some of the old backups will it mess up by TB profile or will I lose any of my emails? Also how can I check these backups to see if they are readable should I need too. I looked in the backup folders but can't actually view a message. Thanks
creator: Ameliaz

title: Saving and using templates.
content:
Hello.

I have been using Thunderbird for several years now, and am very pleased with the results. I do have one (very small, but annoying) problem, however.# I have saved a template which is set up just the way that I need it to be when writing emails, but when I load my template in (by clicking on Write), the template loads, but there are always two hyphens in the top left hand corner which I have to erase before entering my email text. Is there a way to prevent this? Many thanks and best wishes,

John

title: Folders not showing on left of screen
content: Hi. I downloaded TB successfully and added my gmail account successfully but the folder(s) for it are not showing on the left of the screen. I checked View > Folders > All but that had no effect. Everything went well when I added the account and I got the screen saying "Account Added Successfully". Anyone know why I can't see the folders for the account? Thank you.

title: ( Write )  drop down box but it doesn't show all email address's.
content: When I create a email I use the ( Write ) drop down box but it doesn't show all email address's. I have tried to find the difference in the 2 addresses that show and the 1 that doesn't but no luck. I can use one of the addresses that do show then in the "from beside the email showing" use the down arrow then 5 email address's show 1 that no longer is active and the 1 that is active but didn't show in the ( Write ) drop down box. I then change to the correct address. It works but the address should be in the ( Write ) drop down. All help is welcome.
creator: Gerry58

title: smtp broken
content:
Не отправляются письма через google smtp сервер. При этом входящие приходят Прочел и настроил программу по статьям: https://support.mozilla.org/ru/kb/thunderbird-i-gmail https://support.mozilla.org/ru/kb/avtomaticheskij-perevod-pochtovyh-akkauntov-google-oauth20

Версия 102.7.2 (64-битный)

первый аккаунт непосредственно на домене gmail.com, на нем письма не отправляются - висит сообщение об отправке второй аккаунт на google workspace и ему был сменен провайдер с Яндекса на Гугл, в DNS всё прописано, но при отправке - показывает окно с Яндексом, а не Гугл.

имеем такие сообщения, вложил скрины.

В чем может быть проблема?
creator: harenkov

title: Can not attach photos from Library to Thunderbird
content:
After an update - do not know if the update is from Thunderbird or from Microsoft, but I think it is the latter - I can not attach photos from my Library to a mail in Thunderbird - it says there is no e-mail program connected - but there is, certainly, there is (and I can send e-mails), and Thunderbird is set as default.

The funny thing is, that my old laptop (only for hollidays) - same Thunderbird - c a n do this.

The only difference is, that I have never had Outlook at this old laptap.

I have deleted Outlook as totally as I know, but it did not help.
